title: Pushed new version
message: Pushed new version

title: Add Edit>Toggle All action bar item
message:
Add Edit>Toggle All action bar item

Useful for the bigger packs.

title: Avoid uncommon crash
message:
Avoid uncommon crash

On the LG Optimus L9, somehow there was a valid ringtone URI, but it
wasn't in the MediaStore.

title: Fix crash if last tone in pack was disabled
message:
Fix crash if last tone in pack was disabled

Looks like a wrote a bad while loop in RingPackVm's
findNextEnabledTone(). Forgot to reset the search to the start of the
pack if we're at the end. Also avoids an infinite loop by returning
null.

The infinite loop case is if the user has NO tones enabled in a pack. We
won't let them set it in that case. NOTE: they could go back later and
disable all of them, which will crash us. I'm betting that won't happen.

title: New version push
message: New version push

title: Fix for Samsung users
message:
Fix for Samsung users

Samsung devices don't allow setting the ringtone to a file that's not in
the Audio.Media table.

title: Allow tablet users with no SMS ability to install
message: Allow tablet users with no SMS ability to install

title: Had the wrong GA ID
message:
Had the wrong GA ID

So THAT'S why no logs were getting uploaded :(

title: New version push
message: New version push

title: MediaStore ORM and crash fix
message:
MediaStore ORM and crash fix

If the current Ringtone was a URI that had no MediaStore entry, we'd
crash. Don't let that happen.

Also introduces MUCH more stable logic for dealing with dirty states.
RingPack now cleans up after itself, deleting any MediaStore entry with
our package name in the DATA field.

title: Add menu option for switching to next tone
message:
Add menu option for switching to next tone

Makes debugging easier

title: Fix for enabling/disabling tones going crazy
message:
Fix for enabling/disabling tones going crazy

Nasty bug where users would attempt to disable a single tone, (which
would not actually disable), instead other random tones would disable.

Caused by calling enabledCheckBox.setChecked() with a OnCheckChanged
listener still attached. Fix is to set it to null before
programmatically setting.

title: Add featured screenshots
message: Add featured screenshots

title: Add release instructions
message:
Add release instructions

Gradle knows how to build a signed APK now.

title: Safer RingPack parsing
message:
Safer RingPack parsing

We should never crash now, simply fail to add it and either alert the
user or log it.

title: Fixes for signed build
message:
Fixes for signed build

Fragments can only have a default constructor, switch to newInstance
paradigm.

It's possible that the current tone is a RingPack tone not in our list
of Packs, so avoid NullPointerException if that's the case.

When disabling, why not delete all instances of ourselves in the
MediaStore that we can find?

title: Logging to answer hypothesis
message:
Logging to answer hypothesis

Do users expect to be able to tap a selected pack again to disable it?

title: Pack-specific graphics
message:
Pack-specific graphics

If we know what pack image to use for a pack, use it.

Also introduces the ART directory for keeping track of design assets.

title: Add Google Analytics v3
message:
Add Google Analytics v3

v3 for backwards compat. We should be logging out exceptions (both
caught and uncaught), screen views, and some key usage metrics.

The dispatch interval is left at the default (30 minutes). I'm not
exactly sure how that works if the app isn't in the foreground. I think
it will go. I guess we'll wait and see.

title: Add image to ReadMe
message: Add image to ReadMe

title: RingActivity.onActivityResult() not called
message:
RingActivity.onActivityResult() not called

After UP navigation from EditActivity, no result was passed because I
forgot to override onOptionsItemSelected.

title: EditActivity had gray background
message:
EditActivity had gray background

On older devices, if the list of tones was short, the rest of the screen
was gray, not brown. Change the ListView to only take up the room it
needs to fix this.

title: Remove annoying warning dialog
message:
Remove annoying warning dialog

User doesn't really care if some of their tone names don't show.

title: Crash fix
message:
Crash fix

If currentRingtone != null && !currentRingtone.isRingPackTone(), then we
had a null pointer exception.

Check to see if the path of the file contains our package name.

title: Ringtone doesn't play after switching packs
message:
Ringtone doesn't play after switching packs

Move the play-after-set logic to a more obvious place.

title: Crash on ConcurrentModificationException (sometimes)
message:
Crash on ConcurrentModificationException (sometimes)

Attempting to remove an event listener as the even is fired is a bad
idea. Instead, we'll pre-define our event handlers in one place.

title: Crashes when installing a new pack
message:
Crashes when installing a new pack

onStart() and onStop() were the wrong calls to register/deregister our
services. onPause() and onResume() are correct.

title: EditActivity was playing the wrong tone sometimes
message:
EditActivity was playing the wrong tone sometimes

Logic was causing click handlers to get out of sync with view/model

title: Layout fixes
message:
Layout fixes

CacheColorHint needs to be set to brown to avoid a white overlay over
the Editing ListView. Slightly smaller icons to fit on Droid2 display.

title: Android Studio quirks
message:
Android Studio quirks

Moved project location

title: Updates to Readme
message: Updates to Readme

title: RingPack is no longer beta
message:
RingPack is no longer beta

The project has been migrated from Eclipse to Android Studio. There are
also major architectural changes.

The background Service has been eliminated.
